Product_Name: Motorola i760 Phone (Nextel): Cell Phones & Service
Review_Comments: my husband uses this phone for work and it has one of the funniest ringtones i've ever heard. i don't know what it's called but it has an upbeat techno rhythm to it. the walkie talkie feature is very useful as everyone in his business network uses it all the time, including him. it's great for a business that has many locations. i only give this product four stars because i haven't tried it myself so i don't know all the features. but i hope the review i've provided helps

Product_Name: Motorola i760 Phone (Nextel): Cell Phones & Service
Review_Comments: I came over from Cingular after trying there PTT, just not happening for me,  and I will leave it at that.I choose this phone because of the large display and the color of the phone overall, ( Love Blue ) I bought this for 110.00 at a corporate store, I get a discount for the company I work for. We had a problem with the second one took it back and swapped it for a brand new in the box phone.  The clarity and ease of functionality is Fantastic, you dont have to be a rocket scientist to operate this phone and the GPS along with Telenav is fantastic, we also selected this phone because if your not with in range of a cell tower I can still connect to one another like normal walkie talkie's,  hey if your going to spend the money do it right the first time.   I put the extended battery on mine and I get 2 to 3 days before having to recharge, which too me is great.  Dont change the default times for backlighting, thats whats eating the battery time up,  also dont leave a java application in suspension that will eat the battery up also.Buy the data cable and add your own ringtones and backgrounds, Moto has a phonebook manager package on there site which is FREE and is SO easy to use.   For Ringtones and wallpapers u can use WebJal, once again EASY to use.   I looked at other phones and I DONT NEED CAMERAS in a phone, the primary selling feature was the fact of large numbers and ease of use.Michae

Product_Name: Motorola i760 Phone (Nextel): Cell Phones & Service
Review_Comments: My husband and I just recently upgraded to this phone.We were going to got to the i560 but got a great deal on these. So far so good. I switched from an i730. What a difference! It seems lighter. It fits in my pocket better. the other always came unclipped when I stood up, falling to the ground. I like the sound quality better also. The screen is a little bigger than the i730 also. The front screen for caller ID seems a little dark and the area to charge it is a little harder to get to(that plastic still gets in the way!) Those are the only negatives so far. I really like the buttons on the i760. Since my husband is switching from an old i90 he loves it! Hope this helps with purchasing. Also if you have no service you can use these as walkie talkies. We haven't tried that yet

Product_Name: Motorola i760 Phone (Nextel): Cell Phones & Service
Review_Comments: I was having problems with my second i730 transmitting and receiving, so I decided to upgrade my phones.  (the first 730's speaker grill came off, and i tried to glue it back on myself.  A word to the wise, don't use too much glue.)  So, I went to Nextel to get my new i760 after researching it on the internet.  I didn't need a camera phone, since I have a digital camera that takes awesome pictures.  One bad thing is that since I changed my phone back in April, I couldn't sign back up for two years and get the $150.  I could only sign up for a year, and I had to pay $275.  I don't understand that.  But this review is about the phone:Cons: super short battery life, especially if you have the web.instead of having a separate button for each number key, it has three big keys, with little squares to make it look like there are separate keys. unfortunately, you have to be careful and hit the button fairly close to center, otherwise you'll dial the number above or beneath it.  the jury is still out on this one, but i'll list it under cons.  the casing looks like it might break easy since it is mainly plastic, whereas the 730 at least looked like some sort of metal.pros:huge displaya whole lot lighter than the 730i enjoy the photo caller id.  it also shows the photo when you call that personthe sleep mode is a good addition.  if you don't use the phone for a couple of minutes, the phone will power down a little like your screen saver so all you have to do is push a button to wake it up.The only thing I really miss from the 730 is the multitude of the lights around the motorola emblem on the front, especially since there were several colors.  This phone just blinks a lot to your ring tone in a light blue.  OH well.  I'll write more the more i explore the phone.

Product_Name: Palm Treo 650 JAVOSkin - The Soft Low-Profile Case, Steel Blue: Cell Phones & Service
Review_Comments: I really like the JAVOSkin for my Treo -- it's well made and has openings so all the features of the treo are usable.  The material is soft to the touch but strong on protection.  I don't like the lanyard they send with the product, it's about 24" long and reminds me of shoelaces.  I prefer a smaller, more delicate lanyard that would go around my wrist

Product_Name: Palm Treo 650 JAVOSkin - The Soft Low-Profile Case, Steel Blue: Cell Phones & Service
Review_Comments: I tripped and basically THREW my Treo about 15 feet onto the sidewalk.  With the skin on it, no harm done.  None.  This is the second skin I've owned - the first from JAVOSkin - and I like this one better than the first.  The skin is thicker but the covered buttons are better defined and easier to use.  I didn't like the cord attaching bump on the side at first - but I did attach the cord and now it is easier for me to find in my handbag.  I highly recommend this product - whether or not you use the cord

Product_Name: Motorola Slvr L6 L2 Silicon Skin Case - Smoke: Cell Phones & Service
